See All Pages for every public page, but here's some recent notes from the journal.

2023-04-17 Monday

00:13 Need to clean up My Public Brain using Webstoemp as a guide. Okay actually I need to go to bed, but tomorrow I can get to that maybe.

14:17 DPaint.js could be fun if I wanted to get into pixel art

GitHub - steffest/DPaint-js: Webbased image editor, modeled after the legendary Deluxe Paint with a focus on retro Amiga file formats: read and write Amiga icon files and IFF ILBM images

15:03 YouTube embeds work in My Public Brain! More accurately, I recognize and process Logseq’s video shortcode.

2023-04-15 Saturday

14:12 Been working on a nice publishing workflow for exported Logseq graphs.

Since I’ve been sticking to Windows, most of the productivity is via Sublime Text and Sublime Merge.

15:03 Making good use of the System Font Stack for my export-publish workflow

systemfontstack

18:32 This is the part of the show where I start to think about links and backlinks for export. So hey self check out My Logseq Workflow

2023-04-14 Friday

07:19 Trying a thing. I’ve been using Dendron for My Public Brain, and it’s nice. But I’m more of an outliner person for the quick notes. Logseq remains my default. Maybe I can incorporate publishing into My Logseq Workflow? That way I can focus on the site-building instead of the whole PKM stack, what with Dendron being a retired project.
